Caption: Audience at the 2nd Institute Day
Description: Prof. Wolfgang Scheer is visible (seated extreme right) in the photograph. Dr. Wolfgang Scheer was born in 1923, and joined IIT Madras at the age of 36 in 1959. He was responsible for much of the progress in Turbo Machine research and the planning and development of the Department of Mechanical Engineering at IIT Madras from 1959 to 1969.
